title: Navigation in the hills
creator_credit: Explorer Films, Peter Halket, Maurice Dybeck and Nicholas Dybeck
brief_description: Using a blend of map, diagram, model and reality, deals with the basic essentials of map reading and finding one’s way. Covers contours - type of slope and recognition of features, route planning, speed of travel in varying situations, direction - by recognition of features, and by compass, use of the silva compass, navigation in mist.
